attributes.action: Face to face appointments to be reinstated at GP surgeries.
attributes.additional_details: This looks as if it has been orchestrated countrywide, so it will need a Government reaction to ensure that whatever is decided, it will apply to the whole of the UK.
attributes.background: In my local area the elderly and infirm are finding the lack of normal face to face appointments especially difficult. I am concerned that this will allow a large number of patients  to fall through the cracks of the NHS.

rejection.details:
Decisions relating to GP appointments, including decisions on whether face-to-face appointments are appropriate, are operational matters for the NHS, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You might like to sign this petition which calls for a related action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587701
